# `UnprocessedSegmentAssignments` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| assign | [`SegmentAssignments`](segmentassignments-definition.md) | No | The segment assignments to apply. |
| unassign | [`SegmentUnassignments`](segmentunassignments-definition.md) | No | The segment unassignments to apply. |
| count | `number` | Yes | The total number of segment assignments and unassignments that were not successfully processed. |
